profile.description1: Pro-active and self-taught, passionate about programming. I love a job well done, team-working and good pratices. I like challenges and learning new skills
profile.description2: I have always worked with Agile methodologies, continually training myself in HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Javascript ES5/ES6, NodeJS, express, mongoDB, mongoose, mySQL, rest-API, graphQL, TDD, typescript, React and React-Native and much more...

experience.description1: Proyecto Full-stack - Web app developed with webSocket. Implemented with NodeJS, express, mongoose, TDD, ReactJS, sass, i18next, redux, react-router-dom.
experience.description2: Web and mobile App project for capacity control of sports facilities. Implemented with Agile, React-Native-web y React-Native, typescript, i18next, redux, react-navigation.
experience.description3: Full-stack project - Mobile App for book sharing. Implemented with NodeJS, express, mongoose, TDD y React-native.

portfolio.chat: Full-stack project implemented with ReactJs using websockets
